name: leaf-automation-framework
description: LEAF (Lean Enterprise Automation Framework) is a scalable, enterprise-grade testing framework powered by Playwright and Node.js.
author: Lam Le

scripts.test:mobile: tsc --noEmit && playwright test --project 'Google Chrome Mobile' --project 'Firefox Mobile' --project 'Safari Mobile' --project 'Microsoft Edge Mobile'
scripts.test:tablet: tsc --noEmit && playwright test --project 'Google Chrome Tablet' --project 'Firefox Tablet' --project 'Safari Tablet' --project 'Microsoft Edge Tablet'
scripts.test:desktop: tsc --noEmit && playwright test --project 'Google Chrome Desktop' --project 'Firefox Desktop' --project 'Safari Desktop' --project 'Microsoft Edge Desktop'
